name: Soul Fire
description:
This game was created for the Winter Jam of 2020 with a group of 2 programmers and 3 artists.

The Earth has been plunged into an everlasting decay. You are the last torchbearer and you are the only one willing to sacrifice yourself to reignite the machine of life to renew life to the world. You only have three minutes to reach your destination.  The clock is ticking and time is not on your side. As a firekin, you cannot stop your own fire. How will you fare against the clock of time?
